snippet: As he flew back from Arizona last January, his players' disappointment still fresh in his mind, Clemson coach Dabo Swinney began crafting the message he hoped would lead the Tigers past their national championship loss to Alabama and back for anot...
lead_paragraph: As he flew back from Arizona last January, his players' disappointment still fresh in his mind, Clemson coach Dabo Swinney began crafting the message he hoped would lead the Tigers past their national championship loss to Alabama and back for another run at the title.

headline.main: Swinney Changes Mental Approach for Clemson
headline.print_headline: Swinney Changes Mental Approach for Clemson
